basics.name: Logan Fetterly
basics.label: Computer Science Undergrad
basics.summary: I am a recent Computer Science graduate that is looking to specialize in Full-Stack Development and Data Science.

work.summary: Expands on the position of Data Manager to include management of different IT related accounts and general office IT support for program work, database training, meetings, and other technical consultation.

Worked as an intern for EHC providing them excellent data cleaning and data consolidation in preparation for onboarding their digital assets into an online database using Microsoft Excel. I also took the role of an office assistant between projects throughout the year to stay busy and active within the organization. I reduced ~4000 membership records since the date of incorporation down to ~400 concise unique records neatly for database acceptance.

interests.name: Web Development
keywords: Since graduation I've known Web Development is the area I want to specialize in. Every day I'm practicing these technical skills to further myself into an expert full-stack developer.

interests.name: Back-End
keywords: Through my degree I've developed a strong understanding of the fundamentals of Object Oreintated programming. I'm confident I can learn and specilaize in the stack in your company.

interests.name: Data Visualizations
keywords: Both through my education and professional work I've been tasked with creating visualizations to garner business intelligence.
